      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a new camera with the specified projection for its frustum.

      Methods in ray.rage.scene that return types with arguments of type Camera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<Camera> SceneManager.getCameras()
      Lets the caller iterate over all the cameras owned by this manager.
      Methods in ray.rage.scene with parameters of type Camera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SceneManager.destroyCamera(Camera c)
      Destroys the camera by the specified name, if it exists.
      void Camera.Frustum.notifyCamera(Camera cam)
      Tells the frustum which camera it belongs to.
      void SceneManager.notifyRenderScene(Camera camera, Viewport viewport)
      Renders the scene from the viewpoint of the specified camera through the specified viewport.
      void Camera.Listener.onCameraPostRenderScene(Camera cam)
      Called after the scene has been rendered with this camera.
      void Camera.Listener.onCameraPreRenderScene(Camera cam)
      Called prior to the scene being rendered with this camera.
      void SceneManager.Listener.onPostUpdateSceneGraph(SceneManager sm, Camera cam)
      Event emitted after the scene graph has been updated by this manager.
      void SceneManager.Listener.onPreUpdateSceneGraph(SceneManager sm, Camera cam)
      Event emitted before the scene graph is updated by this manager.
